simText.textData:
For this portion of the exercise in this workstation you will:
1. Measure the voltage across the relay coil while operating the circuit, using the MIN-MAX feature of the DMM.
2. Observe the minimum and maximum voltages.
3. Compare the readings to the measurements obtained in the
previous circut (16v MAX; -OL MIN).
4. Determine the effects on a circuit when a relay controls loads and a
clamping diode is installed parallel to the relay's coil.

Please click Continue to proceed.
Click the documents below to review some of the electrical characteristics of this circuit.
Click the documents below to review information about diodes. Click Continue to proceed.
